reason: Bitcoin has demonstrated strong resilience, shrugging off early declines to reclaim the $70,000 level. Bernstein's reiterated $150,000 outlook provides a significant bullish catalyst, while ongoing regulatory talks suggest potential for increased market clarity. Growing institutional coverage of the crypto mining sector further signals mainstream acceptance. Despite the debunking of a government BTC buy rumor, the overall sentiment remains robust, pointing towards continued upward momentum. We recommend watching for a decisive breakout above previous all-time highs, as volatility remains a factor.
headlines: McHenry predicts fast crypto deal as Witt brokers talks

Bitcoin shakes off early decline, returns to $70,000 as Bernstein reiterates $150,000 outlook
